intro: Help Capy God reunite with his family. Sort, organize and group items in this relaxing and chill game!
description:
The Organized Capy God is a relaxing game in which you help a friendly capybara organize all his items while trying to reunite with his family!

Once everything is in order, Capy God will ask you for certain items to fill the world he was creating.

But don't worry! There are no timers, meters or scores. You can take as much time as you like to group items in the way you prefer.

There’s something strangely peaceful about sorting items, give it a try!

FEATURES
-Sort, stack, group and organize!
-Relaxing gameplay.
-Combine certain items to unlock achievements.
-Customize your capy with cute accessories!
-Heartfelt story
-No way to lose, no time pressure.
-Ideal for playing after a long day of work or school to slow your brain down.
-Intuitive drag and drop controls.
-No long dialogues or intense situations that require a lots of skills.
-Satisfaction from a well organized space :)
-More than 200 items to discover!
-Can be played in bite-size sessions.
-Great for all ages.
-Perfect to play while listening to audiobooks or watching videos
-Chill original music.
